reviews.review: For the positives. I enjoy this game, I don't play it for weeks at a time sometimes, but whenever i come back it's got some new things added that make it a little more fun, to try new things out and play a different way, For the most part you can play the game how you would like to and there's a few different things like different killers and different perks to fit your playstyle. For the negatives,  I think the community is toxic and there's an after match chat that's absolutely pointless it's just full of salt and raging most of the time. Some killers are more powerful than others so it's a balancing issue, And there's a few perks that are almost necessary to draft so starting off could be a little rough but once you get some hours in it's a lot of fun with mind games. 8/10
perfect,but i can not play it very well...

Yes this game is awesome must try friends

you'll realize how unbalanced this game is after you play it for a while, dosen't hit at the start and you'll have mixed opinions or bandwagon what a streamer tells you. Although, I can guarantee you this game is survivor sided to the core. Nothing really wrong with that just don't expect anything more from it if all the survivors play as efficiently as possible. Game is really good though and you'll likely have fun on both sides nothing really is gonna make you run into tournament scrim squad survivors or run into very high level skill killers. Just have fun with it no matter how you play the game is designed really well and keeps people playing,

this game is not worth $30.00 $15 at most, $10 at the least. there are to many bugs like broken hit boxes, getting hit unfairly or just getting stuck on pallets ETC. Another problem is toxicity, their are to many toxic play styles and people that it sucks to play because you'll ether go up against a camper, gen rusher or tunnelers. And then get sworn at and reported. The devs, the devs do nothing about what actually matters like removing a player for cheating or being toxic or mean. the game play of DBD gets repetitive quick, so repair 5 gens escape or kill 4 survivors that's it. Another thing is the hooks their are to many around and their to close together so there's no point in wiggling and the wiggle bar is to long it should be shortened. Ranks, the ranks go down from 20 and end at 1 don’t go to rank 1 you get campy killers, tunnelers and you’ll probely see like 2 killers so you’ll keep seeing them over and over again. You’ll have long wait times maybe like 30 mins or 1h or longer.

Its really good 7/10, But the developers are not really good, also there is a LOT of campers - tunnelers (Kills the survivor that just got saved) and its just not fun, but the game its AMAZING if the killer its a good person and its really fun

If you play with a group its fun but if you play solo que it is absolute garbage of a game and extremely unbalanced. played about 10 games in a row and i have never seen the survivors make it past 4 generators left, and you start out with needing to do 5 before the killer wipes you all, about 6 of the 10 games the killer found me and hooked me before you can even make it to the generator that is 10 feet in front of you, the killer has all perks and you get zero. the killer will almost always camp you so no one can come save you. And i just didn't even try to be the killer because it just seemed too over power and cunty. Overall I would rather give myself a lobotomy with my own phallic dick then recommend anyone to waste their money on this piece of shit game.

So to start this, I have played sense launch. i have 415 hours on PC and close to 300 on Xbox one(PC died). This game has a lot of grinding in it. The game at its core is grinding. grinding for those perks you like. Even to spite this, its a lot of fun. There is many different perk and killers to choose from. If you can look passed all the toxic people(yes this game has many), its fun. They come out with a killer every 3 months and generally update the game once a month a minimum. The DLC are all able to be obtain(except Licensed killer/survivors) for free if u play lots and lvl up. The game at its core is simple but there are many elements that can make a game change. i recommend this game to anyone who likes to have a game to hope on once and a while or enjoys player vs player games. i use it as stress relief and it really does help.
Jogo bem divertido. Jogar de sobrevivente com os amigos é bem bacana. Recomendo.

I've been a fan of this game since a friend of mine told me check it out on the Xbox One. 
I started off really bad at first, but I kept getting drawn in by the game. It was different than the hundreds of other games I've already played many times. 
The Dead by Daylight community could be a lot less toxic, but if you ignore all of that, this game is a great challenge for those willing to give it a try.
